text: {{Infobox writer | name = Jenny Han | image = Jenny Han at BookCon - 2019 (26746) (cropped).jpg | caption = Han at BookCon in June 2019 | birth_name = | birth_date = | birth_place = Richmond, Virginia, U.S. | occupation = Author | years_active = 2006present | alma_mater = University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill (BFA) The New School (MFA) | genre = Young adult fiction | website = | nationality = }} Jenny Han (born September 3, 1980) is an American author. Many of her books are young adult fiction and children's fiction. She is best known for writing The Summer I Turned Pretty trilogy and the To All the Boys series. ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:American children's writers Category:American novelists Category:Writers from Richmond, Virginia
title: Jenny Han
